page.title: 17Biography
page.content: {Mr.E.Smith} Mr.Smith was born in Alford and was a lecturer at Nottingham University.He and his wife moved to Willoughby in 1957 and have both worked tirelessly for nature conservation.Mr.Smith received an O.B.E. for his work in this field. {Mr.I.Kay} My dad was five when he started keeping chickens.So he knew a lot about them by the time my Grandad died.He had kept chickens since he was nine and he taught my dad how to carry them and get them ready for shows.Now my dad has over three hundred birds and is the best breeder in Britain.He goes to nearly all the shows every year and sometimes he judges at them. {Written by his daughter,Ulanda,aged {10 years. }
